recipesJson.name: n o t e d : nanacookie
recipesJson.author: matthewkocanda
recipesJson.description: ID10-T pointed out just how many banana recipes I've put together over the years, so I guess it does make sense to have me on the Noted episode about bananas. Here's a quick, off the top recipe I threw together for the occasion. Nothing crazy to write home about, but if you dig bananas, you'll dig this.

pageContext.name: n o t e d : nanacookie
